details.name: description
details.old_value:
Since r2 has more focus on ambient light player models are fully painted black in dark areas. and It's hard to distinguish between enemy and team.

FIXME: check RF_MINLIGHT for player models 

Side note: In general this behaviour is more realistic but  players are not used to know it and as result there are more team kills.
details.new_value:
Since r2 has more focus on ambient light player models are fully painted black in dark areas and It's hard to distinguish between enemy and team.

FIXME: check RF_MINLIGHT for player models 

Side note: In general this behaviour is more realistic but  players are not used to know it and as result there are more team kills.

journals.notes: this is really mappers fault and not renderer, should we really use time fixing this?

RF_MINLIGHT and hilightIntensity of total player model has been fixed:
https://dev.etlegacy.com/projects/etlegacy/repository/revisions/7bffd59586fec425ae51a8871768dbd438ec4303

Ok, I'll close this one - it turned out r1 has such issues as well.

details.name: subject

subject: render2: Player models are painted black in dark areas
description:
Since r2 has more focus on ambient light player models are fully painted black in dark areas and It's hard to distinguish between enemy and team.

FIXME: check RF_MINLIGHT for player models 

Side note: In general this behaviour is more realistic but  players are not used to know it and as result there are more team kills.
